description: i am a director of gold mining company, nevertheless i am a generous and openhearted man and really good person, and of course i am rich enough and want to have a loving family, i am healthy, i love sports, especially tennis, i do not smoke and never drink, i love humour and clever interesting people, and i have a large house that is empty now, and of course a big summer house at the Ocean, and my own office, i have many things but i do not have a family yet... I live in Ecuador because this is the best country for gold mining using my technology, though originally i am from Australia. I would be happy to talk to a woman and invite her to my country. Of course, I will pay everything...
